CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 19, 1946, pg. 8, reads: "Beauticians Hold Membership Tea - The Beauty Shop Owners held their sixth annual membership tea last Sunday at Kay Boys' Club and presented a delightful afternoon to their guests. Among the members there, shown above, were (standing): Mary Tims, Alice Thompson, Carrie Warren Kathleen Holloway, Myrtle Duncan and Ruth Jenkins.  Seated are Mrs. Ersley Kincaid, mistress of ceremonies and Mrs. Rose Johnson, president. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of beauty shop owners, from left: Ersley Kincaid, Mary Tims, Alice Thompson, Carrie Warren Kathleen Holloway, Myrtle Duncan, Ruth Jenkins, and Rose Johnson, posed around table for tea, at Kay Boys Club, another version
